description:
When an explosion in a billiards hall leaves a hustler maimed, Ryo steps in to make sure the hustler`s daughter`s big game isn`t marred by her opponent`s "dirty pool."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mokkori ga Tokkouyaku!? Bijo Hustler to Ai no Kyuuseki
Mokkori is the Best Medicine ?! A Pool Shot to a Pretty Hustler`s Heart
モッコリが特効薬!? 美女ハスラーと愛の球跡
